author: ruthcosier85
title: lovely stay
text:
we thought this hotel was very nice, great location, right in the centre with plenty of restaurants and supermarkets near by, was also right near the metro station which was very handy for us as we used this alot.
was expecting the room to be slightly bigger than it was. we struggled slightly with the amount of space we had but made full use of the kettle and mugs that were provided in the room.
All the staff were very friendly and helpful, (english speaking which helped) and the room was cleaned and bed changed daily.
We had breakfast on our first morning which was lovely, the only thing i would say was that we werent aware that we had to pay a room tax until we arrived at the hotel.
Overall we had a lovely stay at the golden hotel and would stay again.
